## Profile Counter

**Count the number of visits.**

> [!Note]
> This API does not have a official project address or documentation link, if you know, please supplement, thank you very much.

### Parameters

<details >
<summary><small>Click to show/close parameters</small></summary><p></p>

| Name | Type | Required | Default | Description | More Description |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------------------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| ![ref-params] | | | | | |
| `countId` | `string` | `true` |  | The count ID |  |

</details>

```txt
https://profile-counter.glitch.me/{countId}/count.svg
```

<p align="right"><a href="#readme-top"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Back%20to%20top-555555?style=for-the-badge"></a></p>

### Examples

```markdown
<!-- readme-widget-hub -->
![Visitor Count](https://profile-counter.glitch.me/readme-widget-hub/count.svg)
```
